entry.title: Universal Car Roof Rack Aluminum Top Luggage Cross Bar Carrier Window Frame
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brisita
Type: Roof Rack
Price: 98.99

Make your car a vital part of your next adventure with Base Carrier Bars. Designed to allow for quick and simple mounting of bicycle racks, ski, and snowboard holders, and kayak racks, Audi Base Carrier Bars feature support feet, cover caps, and trims made from high-quality and aging-resistant plastic, and mechanical parts made from high-quality coated steel. To ensure the safety of your items, Base Carrier Bars come equipped with an anti-theft locking system and City-Crash test certification.


  • Our Roof Racks High Quality Easy to install and extremely Durable Roof Rack Cross Bars are made from High-Quality Aluminum, to ensure Lightweight and Sturdiness. The Cross Bars are Vehicle Specific, compatible with flush roof rails, and Easy to install at the comfort of your own garage.
  • Premium Roof Rack Make Your Journey More Easily!
  • crossbars are extremely necessary to extend a car’s load-ability.
  • A universal design with adjustable fitting width and anti-theft security locking system is ideal for long road trips and off-road adventures!

Specification:
  • Material: Architectural Grade Aluminum Alloy and PP
  • Color: Silver
  • Max.load capacity: 100KG
  • Max.fitting width: 102cm approx.
  • Bar length: 120cm approx. (We also have 135cm Cross Bar, if you need, please contact us.)
  • Dimension: 122 x 5 x 10 cm approx.
  • Roof Rack Type: Universal Roof Rack

Primary Competitive Advantages:
  • Solid construction for up to 100kg loading capacity.
  • Architectural grade aluminum alloy is anti-aging, anti-rust, and anti-corrosion.
  • Polypropylene is tenacious, acid-resistant, and alkali-resistant.
  • T-slot channel allows easy installation with enhanced strength and low air resistance.
  • Elliptical shape to minimize wind resistance.
  • Adjustable width to fit different vehicles with rails.
  • Adjustable clamps for easy installation.
  • Rubber strip included for extra grip.
  • Comes with an anti-theft security locking system with keys.
  • Fit for vehicles with raised roof rails.
  • Ideal for roof boxes, bags, and roof-mounted cycle carriers.

entry.title: Brisita Bike Rack Car 2 Bike Carrier Hitch RACK Receiver 2'' Heavy Duty Mount Rack Truck SUV
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brisita
Type: Bike Carrier
Price: 85.99

This is our brand new 2'' Hitch mount bike back carrier for cars, trucks, SUVs or minivans which can haul up to 2 bicycles. It will firmly hold

the bikes, so it's perfect for you to carry your bike.

  • Hitch-mounted, platform-style rack carries up to 4 bikes on the back of your vehicle
  • Can be used as either a 2-bike or a 4-bike carrier
  • Precision-clamping, cushioned hooks slide along upright masts for quick, easy bike loading and unloading
  • Hooks move independently of one another to accommodate bikes of the same or differing heights
  • Padding protects your bike's finish
  • Adjustable wheel mounts accept a variety of wheel sizes and wheelbases
  • Wheel holders slide along horizontal arms and secure with hand knobs
  • Arms fold up for compact storage
  • Rust-resistant, sturdy steel construction with black powder coat finish
  • Security cable and hitch mount bolt is not included


Feature

  1. Carry Up to 2 bicycles
  2. Carry bike quickly and safely
  3. Easy to assemble
  4. Compatible with most Bicycle Frames With Adjustable Tire Rods and Individual Ties
  5. Works with many alternative and larger tubed frame bikes
  6. Securely straps for each bike to ensure firmly hold
  7. Compatible with any 2" hitch receiver
  8. Keeps Bikes 12" inches away to protect your vehicle


Specification

  • Condition: Brand new
  • Color: Black
  • Material: Steel
  • Overall dimension: 59" x 23.5" x 23.5"

entry.title: LED Rock Light For Jeep Off Road Rock Lights For trucks UTV ATV 4Pods Underbody Rgb Wheel Light
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brisita
Type: LED Rock Light
Price: 59.89 - 139.89 (3 variants)

We have never produced a better RGB color-shifting LED rock light than the MAX. It now has the brightest, whitest, and cleanest light coverage of any RGB on the market thanks to unique Clean Technology. There's no need to sacrifice output with RGBW any longer! Our LEDs combine the latest in ceramic base LED technology with a diffusing solid polymer body to create a light that is LIT!

The new MAX, like other LUX lights, comes with the LUX proprietary magnetic mounting mechanism, which makes installation a joy! There is no need for screwing, gluing, or taping. It's as simple as placing it on a flat metal surface and turning it on!

 

Amazing Charming Light: Each light employs 3PCS quality led chips, outputs amazing bright and stable light. Features better visibility and safety, also add a bonus of charming light for your night trail.
Unique Finish: Redesigned with a unique black coating finish, get a nicer outlook and better anti-scratching and anti-aging ability.

 

 

Better Heat Dissipation: Instead of glue seal at the back, lights are all in die-cast aluminum housing, effectively helps driving heat outside and cooling down the electronic element inside, gets a better protection and durability, extending a longer lifespan.
Easy Installation: Get lights seated on rubber pads, with wires coming out from the side, and then mount light on the position with screws and nuts provided. Rubber pad works on both flat and curved surface.

 


Universally Fit: Working voltage 10-32V DC, can work as exterior light on any vehicle or position. Such as car under glow lights, wheel well light, reverse/backup light, truck bed light, off-road lights, machinery light, construction lights, forklift lights, boat lights.

 


Specifications:

  • Working voltage: 10-32V DC
  • Theoretical led power: 9W per light
  • LED Quantity: 3pcs Cree LEDs
  • LED Color: Green
  • Wire gauge: 22AWG; Wire length: 14”
  • Waterproof: IP67
  • Material: Die-cast aluminum, PC lens.
  • Lifetime: 50,000 hours

entry.title: FAST ELECTRIC PORTABLE CAR HEATER 12V , HEATING WINDOW FANS DEMISTER DEFROSTER IN CAR
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brisita
Type: CAR HEATER
Price: 29.99

FAST ELECTRIC PORTABLE CAR HEATER 12V

Do you need a small Heater to keep you warm while driving? Our 12v Portable car heaters will keep you and your passengers warm and toasty wherever you drive this winter.
Our portable car warmer that is little but powerful! In no time, will keep you warm and wipe the fog from your car's windows.

With a switch for hot and cold. This electric Car Heater isn't just for defrosting and defogging windows and windshields. However, it can also be utilized as a cooling fan to provide wind in the summer. All you have to do is flip a switch, and the hot or cool air will stream out quickly, depending on your demands.

Compact in size, portable, and simple to set up. A rotating holder is made for easy adjustment, convenience, and utility. It comes with a rotary holder for easy directing and adjustment, similar to a car vent, so you can set it to your chosen angle.
Are you asking what is the best portable car heater? or where can I buy a portable car heater? with brisita you will have the best portable heater for car with free and fast shipping.

This car heater 12v can assist you in removing the fog and frost from your vehicle's windshield. Effectively blocking your view so you can go on the road and get at your destination. You may also heat the interior of your automobile without having to wait 60 seconds for the motor to warm up. Especially beneficial in the winter.
This practical heater runs like defroster in car on the alternator's electricity rather than gas, making it the most energy-efficient way to remain warm. Built-in fuse, automatic power-off protection, anti-voltage, and safer use are all features of this cigarette lighter connector. User-friendly, energy-saving, and low-consumption design.



Any vehicle owner should have a car space heater cigarette lighter warmer. It allows you to quickly defrost your windshield. The device's small size makes it incredibly easy to keep and operate.


 

Specification:

  • Name: Car Heater

  • Material: ABS

  • Packaging: Kraft carton

  • Color: black

  • Weight: about 320g

  • Size: about 12*10*7.2cm/4.72*3.94*2.83in

  • line length: about 110cm/43.31in

  • Package size: about 12.3*14*10cm/4.84*5.51*3.94in

  • Applicable models:12V/120W defroster: Fit for most 12V Vehicle Cars, Except for Honda, Toyota, Chevrolet Aveo, Mazda, Nissan X-TRAIL, Kia K2/ Cerato, etc. （Please confirm before ordering）

Note:

For better use of the heater, please note the following notes:

1.The heater is a high-power electrical appliance for vehicles, and its working current is relatively large (12.5A or so), so it cannot work for a long time (40-60 minutes). Do not use during engine shutdown in case the storage battery runs out of power.

2.If there occurs sudden shutdown after a few minutes of power-on, this is caused by the current shortage of current protection of the cigarette holder, but not a product problem. It can be normally used if the current of protector reaching 15A, otherwise it cannot work with current less than 12A.

3.The heater is high-power electrical appliance, the plug should be inserted tightly when using, and keep good power condition. Do not touch the metal parts of cigarette lighter to avoid burns when pulling out the plug after long use.

Packing List:

  • 1*Car Defroster
